columns.name: RowId
columns.description: Contains a unique id for this run
columns.caption: Row Id

columns.name: Flag
columns.description: Contains a reference to a user-editable comment about this row
columns.caption: Flag

columns.name: Links
columns.description: Link to the run's graph

columns.name: Name
columns.description: The assay/experiment ID that uniquely identifies this assay run.
columns.caption: Assay Id

columns.name: Comments
columns.description: Contains comments about this run
columns.caption: Comments

columns.name: Created
columns.description: Contains the time at which this run was created
columns.caption: Created

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: Contains the user who created this run
columns.caption: Created By

columns.name: Modified
columns.description: Contains the time at which this run was last modified
columns.caption: Modified

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: Contains the user who last modified this run
columns.caption: Modified By

columns.name: Folder
columns.description: Contains the folder or project in which this run is stored
columns.caption: Folder

columns.name: FilePathRoot
columns.description: Contains the directory on the server's file system where this run's data files come from
columns.caption: File Path Root

columns.name: JobId
columns.description: Contains the Id of the pipeline job that created this run, if applicable
columns.caption: Job

columns.name: ReplacedByRun
columns.description: The run that has replaced this run, usually with updated or corrected information
columns.caption: Replaced By

columns.name: ReplacesRun
columns.description: The run that this run replaces, usually with updated or corrected information
columns.caption: Replaces

columns.name: LSID
columns.description: Contains the life sciences identifier for this run
columns.caption: LSID

columns.name: Protocol
columns.description: Contains the protocol that this run follows
columns.caption: Protocol

columns.name: RunGroups
columns.description: Contains a unique id for this run
columns.caption: Run Groups

columns.name: RunGroupToggle
columns.description: A lookup to individual columns that show if the run is a member of each run group that's in scope
columns.caption: Run Group Toggle

columns.name: Input
columns.description: Contains pointers to all of the different kinds of inputs (both materials and data files) that could be used for this run
columns.caption: Input

columns.name: Output
columns.description: Contains pointers to all of the different kinds of outputs (both materials and data files) that could be produced by this run
columns.caption: Output

columns.name: DataInputs
columns.description: Contains multi-value lookup to each data inputs produced by this run
columns.caption: Data Inputs

columns.name: DataOutputs
columns.description: Contains multi-value lookup to each data outputs produced by this run
columns.caption: Data Outputs

columns.name: RunProperties
columns.description: Contains the life sciences identifier for this run
columns.caption: Run Properties

columns.name: Batch
columns.description: Contains the associated batch or empty if this run is not part of a batch.
columns.caption: Batch
